com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.deviceinfo

Enum DeviceInfo.Features

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DeviceInfo.Features>
      • com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.deviceinfo.DeviceInfo.Features
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DeviceInfo.Features>
    Enclosing class:
    DeviceInfo

    public static enum DeviceInfo.Features
extends java.lang.Enum<DeviceInfo.Features>
    The list of features that can be detected with the function isFeatureSupported(Feature, Context)
    See Also:
    DeviceInfo.isFeatureSupported(com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.deviceinfo.DeviceInfo.Features, Context)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FEATURE_FLUENCE
      Qualcomm's Noise Cancellation Technology.
      FEATURE_INDOOR_POSITIONING
      Precise Indoor Positioning provides venue-specific indoor location data inside a growing number of location-enabled buildings
      FEATURE_LOW_POWER_GEOFENCE
      Qualcomm's geofencing engine provides the same functionality the standard Android API but with improved responsiveness and lower power consumption
      FEATURE_OPTIMAL_CRITERIA_POSITIONING
      Qualcomm's Optimal Criteria Positioning feature provides a better accuracy on the GPS position
      FEATURE_SURROUND_SOUND_RECORDING
      Surround Sound Recording allows for 5.1 surround sound input using existing microphones on the device

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • FEATURE_SURROUND_SOUND_RECORDING

        public static final DeviceInfo.Features FEATURE_SURROUND_SOUND_RECORDING
        Surround Sound Recording allows for 5.1 surround sound input using existing microphones on the device

      • FEATURE_FLUENCE

        public static final DeviceInfo.Features FEATURE_FLUENCE
        Qualcomm's Noise Cancellation Technology. If isFeatureSupported returns true for this feature, then it can be assumed that echo cancellation is supported on the voice path. If isFeatureSupported returns true for this feature, and the standard Android API android.media.audiofx.AcousticEchoCanceler.isAvailable() also returns true, then it can be assumed that echo cancellation is also available on the audio path.

      • FEATURE_INDOOR_POSITIONING

        public static final DeviceInfo.Features FEATURE_INDOOR_POSITIONING
        Precise Indoor Positioning provides venue-specific indoor location data inside a growing number of location-enabled buildings

      • FEATURE_LOW_POWER_GEOFENCE

        public static final DeviceInfo.Features FEATURE_LOW_POWER_GEOFENCE
        Qualcomm's geofencing engine provides the same functionality the standard Android API but with improved responsiveness and lower power consumption

      • FEATURE_OPTIMAL_CRITERIA_POSITIONING

        public static final DeviceInfo.Features FEATURE_OPTIMAL_CRITERIA_POSITIONING
        Qualcomm's Optimal Criteria Positioning feature provides a better accuracy on the GPS position
